panels.description: Number of writes (set operations) per second to this bucket (measured from cmd_set)
panels.title: sets per sec

panels.description: Number of reads (get operations) per second from this bucket (measured from cmd_get)
panels.title: gets per sec

panels.description: Number of connections to this server including " "connections from external client SDKs, proxies, " "DCP requests and internal statistic gathering
panels.title: curr_connections

panels.description: Number of unique items in this bucket - only active items, not replica
panels.title: curr_items

panels.description: The total size on disk of all data and view files for this bucket
panels.title: Total Disk Size

panels.description: Memory used as measured from mem_used (in GB)
panels.title: Memory Used

panels.description: Number of items waiting to be written to disk in this bucket
panels.title: disk_write_queue

panels.description: Number of operations with a CAS id per second for this bucket (measured from cas_hits)
panels.title: CAS ops per sec

panels.description: Percentage of CPU in use across all available cores on this server
panels.title: cpu_utilization_rate

panels.description:
Number of new items created on disk per second for this bucket "
                                       "(measured from vb_active_ops_create + vb_replica_ops_create "
                                       "+ vb_pending_ops_create
panels.title: disk creates per sec.

panels.description: Number of disk read failures (measured from ep_data_read_failed)
panels.title: disk write failures

panels.description: Actual data size consumed by the index
panels.title: index data size

panels.description: Number of N1QL requests processed per second
panels.title: N1QL queries/sec

panels.description: Number of reads per second from disk for this bucket (measured from ep_bg_fetched)
panels.title: ep_bg_fetched

panels.description: Number of back-offs sent per second to client SDKs due to "  "\"out of memory\" situations from this bucket (measured from ep_tmp_oom_errors)
panels.title: temp OOM per sec

panels.description: Percentage of active items cached in RAM in this bucket (measured from  "vb_active_resident_items_ratio)
panels.title: vb_active_resident_items_ratio

panels.description: Number of disk read failures (measured from ep_data_read_failed)
panels.title: disk read failures

panels.description: Percentage of replica items cached in RAM in this bucket
panels.title: vb_replica_resident_items_ratio

panels.description: Number of items remaining to be sent to consumer in this bucket
panels.title: ep_dcp_replica_items_remaining

panels.description: Out of Memory errors
panels.title: ep_oom_errors

panels.description: How much fragmented data there is to be compacted compared to real data for the data files in this bucket
panels.title: docs fragmentation %

panels.description: Items commit Failed
panels.title: ep_item_commit_failed

panels.description: Total amount of item  metadata consuming RAM in this bucket. Measured from ep_meta_data_memory
panels.title: metadata in RAM

panels.description: ep_ops_update - Number of items updated on disk per second for this bucket. Measured from vb_active_ops_update + vb_replica_ops_update " "+ vb_pending_ops_update
panels.title: no of updates

panels.description: Number of delete operations per second for data that this bucket. Contains (measured from delete_hits)
panels.title: delete_hits

panels.description: Average disk update time in microseconds as from disk_update histogram of timings
panels.title: avg_disk_update_time

panels.description: Total number of items per second being written to disk in this bucket
panels.title: ep_diskqueue_drain

panels.description: Total number of items per second being put on the disk queue in this
panels.title: ep_diskqueue_fill

panels.description: Number of documents pending to be indexed
panels.title: total mutations remaining

panels.description: Number of documents indexed by the indexer per second
panels.title: drain rate items/sec

panels.description: Current total indexed document count
panels.title: total indexed items

panels.description:
Percentage of accesses to this index data"
                                    "from disk as opposed to RAM (measured from"
                                    "cache_misses * 100 / (cache_misses +"
                                    "cache_hits))
panels.title: index cache miss ratio

panels.description: Percentage of index data resident in memory
panels.title: Percentage of index data resident in memory

panels.description: Total memory consumed by the index storage
panels.title: Total memory consumed by the index storage

panels.description: Number of index items scanned by the indexer per second
panels.title: items scanned/sec

panels.description: Index  - Avg time to serve a scan request
panels.title: avg_scan_latency

panels.description: percentage fragmentation of the index
panels.title: index_frag_percent

panels.description: Number of queries that take longer than 500 ms per second
panels.title: Queries > 500ms

panels.description: Number of queries that take longer than 1000 ms per second
panels.title: query_requests_1000ms

panels.description: Number of queries that take longer than 5000 ms per second
panels.title: query_requests_5000ms

panels.description: Average end-to-end time to process a query (in seconds)
panels.title: request time (sec)

panels.description: Average time to execute a query (in seconds)
panels.title: service time(sec)

panels.description: Number of mutations to be replicated to the remote cluster
panels.title: Mutations

panels.description: Number of mutations to be replicated to the remote cluster
panels.title: Mutations

panels.description: Memory Utilization by Couchbase services. An output of TOP command
panels.title: Memory % Util by Couchbase Services
